definition: a thorn/fig. to ridicule sb/fig. sth wrong
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
erhua variant of 挑毛剔刺[tiao1 mao2 ti1 ci4]

sentences.english: His finger was spitted a thorn.
His irreverence for authority marks him out as a troublemaker.
sentences.chinese: 他对权威的不敬使他成了一个惹是生非的刺儿头。

sentences.english: The wild thistle has a very high nutritional value.
sentences.chinese: 野生的刺儿菜营养价值很高。

sentences.english: Eg:He is known to be a troublesome person in his unit. Nobody likes to deal with him.
sentences.chinese: 他是单位有名的刺儿头，没有人愿意与他打交道。

sentences.english: Every so often, love comes with pain as rose is in bloom with thorns.
sentences.chinese: 爱情伴随痛苦而至，犹如玫瑰伴随刺儿绽放。

sentences.english: Shut up, Martin, alright? He gigged everybody.
sentences.chinese: 马丁，闭上嘴好吗？他挑每个人的刺儿。

sentences.english: PERCONTE: Shut up, Martin, alright? He gigged everybody.
sentences.chinese: 马丁，闭上嘴好吗？他挑每个人的刺儿。

sentences.english: My shirt got hooked on a thorn.
sentences.chinese: 一根刺儿挂着了我的衬衣。

sentences.english: When eating wild pigweed , you should pay attention to your safety .
sentences.chinese: 刺儿菜食用野生的灰菜应注意安全。

sentences.english: Stick a hook on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一根刺儿挂着了我的衬衣。

sentences.english: There's always a sting in his words.
The modest Rose puts forth a thorn.
My quills are dark brown with a little white mixed in.
sentences.chinese: 我的刺儿是深棕色的，混合着一点儿白色。

definition: an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
to look for bones in an egg/to find fault/to nitpick (idiom)
pinyin: ji1 dan4 li5 tiao1 gu3 tou5

definition: one's thoughts/mind/intention/willingness to accept new ideas/baseless suspicions
